name: Jeremy's Philly Steak and Cheese Sandwich
author: ODIE713
summary: This is a very filling sandwich, great to make ahead of time and keep warm in the oven for a Superbowl party or any other time. But you better like cheese!
ingredients: 1  French baguette, cut in half lengthwise
directions: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Saute the white and red onions, mushrooms, and garlic until tender
Remove from the pan, and set aside
Place the sliced beef in the pan, and fry until no longer pink, about 5 minutes
Reduce heat to low, and stir in the cream cheese and Worcestershire sauce, cooking and stirring until the beef is well coated
Season with salt and pepper to taste
Place beef mixture onto bottom half of the baguette, then cover the beef with the onion mixture
Place Swiss cheese over the onion mixture
Place open sandwich under a hot broiler until the cheese is melted
Place top of baguette onto the toppings, and serve
